description:
The English Project are releasing their long awaited CD.  Since the beginning of Three Heads, Chris English has been one of our biggest musical supporters.  He has played every Homegrown we have thrown and most of our big events.  There is a simple reason why....he is amazing.  

Now with the English Project, he has surrounded himself with a crew of incredibly talented musicians and they are about to take the scene by storm.  Playing funk, soul, gospel, groove and rock, the music will make you need to dance.  

Come help us support one of favorites.  

Doors 7
Music 8
$10
name: The English Project CD Release Party Volume 1
